pages.text: An imperfect ritual that grants temporary creative flight. This costly ritual provides 10 minutes of unrestricted flight through the heavens.$(br2)$(bold)Setup:$()$(br)Place Ancient Debris on top of an Imperfect Ritual Stone.$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$() 10000 LP per use$(br2)$(bold)Note:$() The ritual has no persistent effect - it activates once and completes immediately. The stone can be reused.

pages.title: Effects
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$()$(br)Right-click the Imperfect Ritual Stone to:$(li)Gain the Flight effect for 10 minutes$(li)Lightning strikes the ritual stone$(li)The stone remains for reuse$(br2)$(bold)Flight Details:$()$(li)Creative-style flight$(li)600 second duration$(li)Can be reapplied before expiration$(br2)$(bold)Warning:$() The high LP cost makes this a premium ritual!$(br2)$(italic)Touch the boundless skies.$()
